Blackfang watched silently Owlhawk, he studied the bot quietly.

Blackfang: The predacons are currently engaged in heavy combat, sir. 
(He turned to Rodimus) From what I gather, Talos is not the leader 
anymore. I will follow you, Rodimus Prime, but I must advise caution 
here. There is amother group on this planet and we know nothing of 
them. Just as they are hostile to the Predacons, they may be hostile 
to us too. I will abide by your decision, though.

> Nightlight:::
>

I

>
